banner.title: Your Trusted Partner in Construction, Renovation
banner.subtitle: and Specialized Repairs

overview: FORGE is a leading construction and maintenance company specializing in a wide range of services including residential and government building construction, metal tank and pipeline repairs, welding, electrical and network wiring, plumbing, HVAC systems, and more. Committed to quality, safety, and customer satisfaction, FORGE T&C EST delivers reliable and efficient solutions tailored to meet the needs of diverse projects across Saudi Arabia. With experienced professionals and a strong dedication to excellence, the company is your trusted partner for all construction and repair services.

contactUs.desc: Reach out to us for queries, collaborations, or support. We are here to assist you.

OurServicesDes.para: At FORGE T&C EST, we offer a comprehensive range of construction, maintenance, and specialized repair services designed to meet the diverse needs of our clients. Our expertise covers both residential and commercial sectors, ensuring high-quality results with every project.

OurServicesDes.footP: With a skilled team and commitment to excellence, FORGE T&C EST ensures every service is delivered with precision, safety, and client satisfaction in mind.

header.title: About Us
header.tagline: Building the future with integrity, innovation, and passion.

paragraphs: Welcome to FORGE ‚Äî your reliable partner in construction, engineering, interior design, electrical and mechanical works, and general maintenance solutions. We are driven by a core commitment to quality, safety, and sustainability, delivering value that lasts for generations.

Since our inception, we have consistently delivered high-performing, efficient, and aesthetically superior projects. Our diverse portfolio ranges from civil and structural construction to turnkey interior fit-outs, MEP installations, solar energy systems, and long-term maintenance services.

Backed by a multidisciplinary team of seasoned professionals, engineers, and technicians, we blend technical excellence with creative problem-solving to meet the most complex client requirements. We believe in forming long-term partnerships and growing with the evolving needs of our clients and communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph: Why is our mission limited to the following core areas?
point: Comprehensive decoration with superior quality and precision
mission.endpara: Please note that Forge Establishment engages in many other activities beyond these key services. To provide our website visitors with a clear and concise overview, we have summarized our mission around these primary focuses. However, you can explore the full range of our activities by clicking the button below to view all services and select those most relevant to your needs.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph: We aim to be the leading choice in Saudi Arabia for integrated construction and maintenance solutions, by fostering excellence, adopting cutting-edge technology, and contributing to the development of urban projects with global¬†standards.

ceo.title: About Our CEO
ceo.name: Fahad A Alqahtani
paragraphs: Fahad A Alqahtani is the visionary leader behind FORGE. With over two decades of expertise in civil engineering, infrastructure development, and multidisciplinary project execution, he has cultivated a culture of integrity, precision, and excellence across all company operations.

His leadership philosophy centers around client trust, team empowerment, and continuous improvement. Under his guidance, the company has expanded its capabilities across multiple verticals, gained the trust of leading clients, and delivered iconic projects that reflect both technical excellence and human-centered design.
Through a clear vision and strategic planning, he continues to lead the company toward growth, innovation, and operational excellence, setting new benchmarks in quality and customer satisfaction.
